page.title: 12Fashion.
page.content: The sort of clothes that are fashionable at the moment are bright dresses or blouses or skirts.Blouses with V backs are also fashionable. Clothes aren't the only fashionable things.Pop groups are popular.There are lots but some of the most popular groups are{Duran Duran,Tears for} {Fears,Wham,and Spandau Ballet.} High heeled shoes for ladies are common. Make up is another fashion.There are many different colours.Make up consists of different things,{Eye} {liner Mascara,Lipstick,Blusher,Face} {powder.} Hair can be dyed many colours and shaped in many styles.Roller skating is also a fashion but it has been for a while.People go roller skating at roller skating discos. Emma Griffiths.
